name: Quinoa Salad with Mint, Almonds and Cranberries
author: ConnorsTasteBuds
summary: Are you tired of eating your leftover Thanksgiving meal? If you are, try this recipe. It is healthy and delicious. The combination of the minty mint and the sweet cranberries are so refreshing, just like a dip in the pool.
ingredients: ½ cup coarsely chopped mint leaves
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring the chicken broth to a boil in a saucepan over high heat
Add quinoa, reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until the quinoa is tender and the liquid has been absorbed, about 13 minutes
Stir in olive oil; fluff quinoa  with a fork
Stir mint, almonds, dried cranberries, kale, carrots, celery, scallion, grape tomatoes, lemon juice, and lemon zest
Season to taste with salt and ground black pepper
